summary: Comprehensive testing of CORTEXIFY ChatGPT-style AI chat application completed. Backend APIs fully functional with 7/7 tests passed. Frontend testing mostly successful with excellent UI/UX, proper responsive design, and all core features working. Minor timeout issue identified with long message processing.

integration_issues.issue: Long message processing timeout - typing indicator may not disappear for complex queries taking >20 seconds
integration_issues.details: AI responses for complex/long messages may exceed 20-second timeout, causing typing indicator to remain visible

passed_tests: Backend chat message sending and AI responses
Backend session management (create, list, get history, delete)
Frontend app loading and CORTEXIFY branding
Frontend chat functionality and message display
Frontend new chat button and session reset
Frontend sidebar toggle in mobile view
Frontend input validation (disabled send for empty input)
Frontend long message text wrapping and display
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding timeout handling or progress indicators for long AI response processing. The app is fully functional but may benefit from better UX for complex queries that take >20 seconds to process.
